typeSystemDescription.name: UceDynamicMetadata
typeSystemDescription.description: For UCE, we don't know what kind of data we are importing. Consequently, we need some form of dynamic properties that hold additional data according to the corpus, that is interchangable and usable for filtering for example. This typesystem was created for this.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.uce.Metadata
typeDescription.description: Dynamic metadata triplets, consisting of a key, a value and the type modelling the value.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.uce.MetadataValueType
typeDescription.description: An ENUM description of the valueType field of the respective uce.Metadata typesystem.

value.description: Raw JSON String, containing unlimited fields, lists and objects.
A link to an external resource.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.uce.Permission
typeDescription.description: Provides permission details for a document. Note that this annotation can be included multiple times to configure access to multiple users.

featureDescription.name: permissionType
featureDescription.description: Permission type, e.g. on user or group level.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.uce.PermissionType
typeDescription.description: Permission type, currently "user" or "group" are supported.

value.description: This permission will be evaluated based on the user's group.
This permission will be evaluated based on the user's group.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.uce.PermissionLevel
typeDescription.description: Permission level, note that internally they are stored as: NONE=0, READ=1, WRITE=2, OWNER=3.

value.description: Read access, this includes search/filter functionality.
